resources.string:
Hello, my name is Dmytro. I love Android development. 

I attained the specialization as a carpenter-builder in a building lyceum and a hydropower engineer in the state academy. 
Got a qualification as a sales manager. 

Since December 2018, I devoted myself entirely to the change of activity towards the study of programming and Android in particular. 

Currently looking for training in Zaporizhzhia city, Ukraine.
